449:491: anye punarmahāmate tīrthakaradṛṣṭayo rūpakāraṇasaṃsthānābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭā ākāśabhāvāparicchedakuśalā rūpamākāśabhāvavigataṃ paricchedaṃ dṛṣṭvā vikalpayanti |
449:495: bhūtāni mahāmate pravartamānāni parasparasvalakṣaṇabhedabhinnāni ākāśe cāpratiṣṭhitāni |
449:497: evameva śaśasya viṣāṇaṃ mahāmate goviṣāṇamapekṣya bhavati |

449:506: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
449:507: dṛśyaṃ na vidyate cittaṃ cittaṃ dṛśyātpravartate |
449:513: aṇuśo bhajyamānaṃ hi naiva rūpaṃ vikalpayet |
449:517: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi svacittadṛśyadhārāviśuddhyarthaṃ bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma-kathaṃ bhagavan svacittadṛśyadhārā viśudhyati yugapatkramavṛttyā vā ?
449:518: bhagavānāha-kramavṛttyā mahāmate svacittadṛśyadhārā viśudhyati na yugapat |
449:519: tadyathā mahāmate āmraphalāni kramaśaḥ pacyante na yugapat,
449:520: evameva mahāmate svacittadṛśyadhārā sattvānāṃ kramaśo viśudhyati na yugapat |
449:521: tadyathā mahāmate kumbhakāraḥ kramaśo bhāṇḍāni kurute na yugapat,
449:522: evameva mahāmate tathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ kramaśo viśodhayati na yugapat |
449:523: tadyathā mahāmate pṛthivyāṃ tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayaḥ kramavṛttyā virohanti na yugapat,
449:524: evameva mahāmate sattvānāṃ tathāgataḥ kramaśaḥ svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ viśodhayati na yugapat |
449:525: tadyathā mahāmate hāsyalāsyagītavāditravīṇālekhyayogyāḥ kramaśaḥ pravartante na yugapat,
449:526: evemeva mahāmate tathāgataḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kramaśaḥ svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ viśodhayati na yugapat |
449:527: tadyathā mahāmate darpaṇāntargatāḥ sarvarūpāvabhāsāḥ saṃdṛśyante nirvikalpā yugapat,
449:528: evameva mahāmate svacittadṛśyadhārāṃ yugapattathāgataḥ sarvasattvānāṃ viśodhayati nirvikalpāṃ nirābhāsagocarām |
449:529: tadyathā mahāmate somādityamaṇḍalaṃ yugapatsarvarūpāvabhāsān kiraṇaiḥ prakāśayati,
449:530: evameva mahāmate tathāgataḥ svacittadṛśyadauṣṭhulyavāsanāvigatānāṃ sattvānāṃ yugapadacintyajñānajinagocaraviṣayaṃ saṃdarśayati |
449:532: evameva mahāmate niṣyandabuddho yugapatsattvagocaraṃ paripācya ākaniṣṭhabhavanavimānālayayogaṃ yogināmarpayati |
449:538: tathā khyāyannapi mahāmate tadātmako na bhavati,
449:539: evameva mahāmate paratantrasvabhāve parikalpitasvabhāve vividhavikalpacittavicitralakṣaṇaṃ khyāyate |
449:549: punaraparaṃ mahāmate dvividhaṃ śrāvakayānanayaprabhedalakṣaṇaṃ yaduta pratyātmāryādhigamaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ca bhāvavikalpasvabhāvābhiniveśalakṣaṇaṃ ca |
449:552: svacittaṃ samādhāya dhyānavimokṣasamādhimārgaphalasamāpattivimuktivāsanācintyapariṇaticyutivigataṃ pratyātmāryagatilakṣaṇasukhavihāraṃ mahāmate adhigacchanti śrāvakāḥ |
449:554: etaddhi mahāmate śrāvakāṇāṃ pratyātmāryādhigamavihārasukhamadhigamya bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nirodhasukhaṃ samāpattisukhaṃ ca sattvakriyāpekṣayā pūrvasvapraṇidhānābhinirhṛtatayā ca na sākṣātkaraṇīyam |
449:555: etanmahāmate śrāvakāṇāṃ pratyātmāryagatilakṣaṇasukhaṃ yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratyātmāryagatilakṣaṇasukhe na śikṣitavyam |
449:557: yaduta nīlapītoṣṇadravacalakaṭhināni mahābhūtānyakriyāpravṛttāni svasāmānyalakṣaṇayuktyāgamapramāṇasuvinibaddhāni dṛṣṭvā tatsvabhāvābhiniveśavikalpaḥ pravartate |
449:562: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-nityamacintyaṃ ca bhagavatā pratyātmāryagatigocaraṃ paramārthagocaraṃ ca prabhāṣitam |
449:564: bhagavānāha-na mahāmate tīrthakarāṇāṃ kāraṇasya nityācintyatāṃ prāpnoti |
449:571: mama tu mahāmate paramārthanityācintyaṃ paramārthalakṣaṇahetuyuktaṃ bhāvābhāvavigataṃ pratyātmāryādhigamalakṣaṇatvāllakṣaṇavatparamārthajñānahetutvācca hetumadbhāvābhāvavigatatvādakṛtakākāśanirvāṇanirodhadṛṣṭāntasādharmyānnityam |
449:574: tasmāttarhi mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nityācintyapratyātmāryajñānādhigamāya yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ ||
449:577: yadi punarmahāmate tīrthakarāṇāṃ nityācintyatā kṛtakabhāvābhāvādanityatāṃ dṛṣṭvā anumānabuddhyā nityaṃ samāpyate,
449:578: tenaiva hetunā mamāpi mahāmate kṛtakabhāvābhāvādanityatāṃ dṛṣṭvā nityamahetūpadeśāt ||
449:583: yaduta vāgvikalpamātraṃ hi mahāmate śaśaviṣāṇaṃ svahetulakṣaṇābhāvāt |
449:590: saṃsāranirvāṇayoraviśeṣajñāḥ sarvabhāvavikalpābhāvādindriyāṇāmanāgataviṣayoparamācca mahāmate nirvāṇaṃ vikalpayanti na pratyātmagativijñānālayaṃ parāvṛttipūrvakaṃ mahāmate |
449:593: ataste mahāmate atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ svacittadṛśyagocarānabhijñā bāhyacittadṛśyagocarābhiniviṣṭāḥ |
449:602: dehabhogapratiṣṭhāgatisvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ mahāmate ālayavijñānaṃ grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇena pravartamānaṃ bālā utpādasthitibhaṅgadṛṣṭidvayapatitāśayā utpādaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ sadasatorvikalpayanti |
449:606: yaduta śrāvakayānābhisamayagotraṃ pratyekabuddhayānābhisamayagotraṃ tathāgatayānābhisamayagotram aniyataikataragotram agotraṃ ca pañcamam |
449:612: yaḥ śrāvakayānābhisamayaṃ dṛṣṭvā ṣaṭpañcamyāṃ bhūmau paryutthānakleśaprahīṇo vāsanakleśāprahīṇo'cintyācyutigataḥ samyaksiṃhanādaṃ nadati-kṣīṇā me jātiḥ,
449:616: anye punarmahāmate kāraṇādhīnān sarvadharmān dṛṣṭvā nirvāṇagatibuddhayo bhavanti |
449:619: atra te mahāmate kudṛṣṭivyāvṛttyarthaṃ yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ ||
449:623: sa pratyekabuddhayānābhisamayagotraka iti viditvā pratyekabuddhayānābhisamayānurūpā kathā karaṇīyā |
449:628: yadā punarmahāmate trayāṇāmapyeṣāmanyatame deśyamāne svacittadṛśyadehālabhogapratiṣṭhācintyaviṣaye deśyamāne notrasati na saṃtrasati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
449:631: aniyatagotrakaḥ punarmahāmate triṣvapyeteṣu deśyamāneṣu yatrānunīyate tatrānuyojyaḥ syāt |
449:634: pratyātmālaye tu svakleśavāsanāśuddhasya dharmanairātmyadarśanātsamādhisukhavihāraṃ prāpya śrāvako jinakāyatāṃ pratilapsyate ||
449:635: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣat -
449:647: yaduta bodhisattvapiṭakanikṣepo'bhyākhyānaṃ ca naite sūtrāntā vinayamokṣānukūlā iti bruvataḥ sarvakuśalamūlotsargatvānna nirvāyate |
449:648: dvitīyaḥ punarmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ bhavapraṇidhānopāyapūrvakatvānnāparinirvṛtaiḥ sarvasattvaiḥ parinirvāsyāmīti tato na parinirvāti |
449:650: punarapi mahāmatirāha-katamo'tra bhagavan atyantato na parinirvāti ?
449:651: bhagavānāha-bodhisattvecchantiko'tra mahāmate ādiparinirvṛtān sarvadharmān viditvā atyantato na parinirvāti |
449:655: yaduta aparityaktā hi mahāmate tathāgatānāṃ sarvasattvāḥ |
449:657: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svabhāvalakṣaṇatrayakuśalena bhavitavyam |
449:662: parikalpitasvabhāvaṃ vyavasthāpayanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā nāmābhiniveśalakṣaṇena ca nāmavastunimittābhiniveśalakṣaṇena ca |
449:664: nimittalakṣaṇābhiniveśaḥ punaryaduta teṣveva ādhyātmikabāhyeṣu dharmeṣu svasāmānyalakṣaṇaparijñānāvabodhaḥ |
449:673: eṣa mahāmate pañcadharmasvabhāvalakṣaṇapravicayo nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ pratyātmāryajñānagatigocaraḥ,
449:675: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nairātmyadvayalakṣaṇapravicayakuśalena bhavitavyam |
449:677: yaduta ātmātmīyarahitaskandhadhātvāyatanakadambamajñānakarmatṛṣṇāprabhavaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpādigrahaṇābhiniveśātpravartamānaṃ vijñānaṃ sarvendriyaiḥ svacittadṛśyabhājanadehālayasvacittavikalpavikalpitaṃ vijñāpayati |
449:683: yathā mahāmate skandhadhātvāyatanānyātmavirahitāni skandhasamūhamātraṃ hetukarmatṛṣṇāsūtropanibaddhamanyonyapratyayatayā pravartate nirīham,
449:684: tathā skandhā api mahāmate svasāmānyalakṣaṇavirahitā abhūtaparikalpalakṣaṇavicitraprabhāvitā bālairvikalpyante na tvāryaiḥ |
449:685: cittamanomanovijñānapañcadharmasvabhāvarahitān mahāmate sarvadharmān vibhāvayan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmanairātmyakuśalo bhavati |
449:686: dharmanairātmyakuśalaḥ punarmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nacirātprathamāṃ bodhisattvabhūmiṃ nirābhāsapravicayāṃ pratilabhate |
449:688: sa tasyāṃ pratiṣṭhito'nekaratnamuktopaśobhite mahāpadmarāje padmakṛtau mahāratnavimāne māyāsvabhāvagocaraparicayābhinirvṛtte niṣaṇṇaḥ tadanurūpairjinaputraiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvabuddhakṣetrāgatairbuddhapāṇyabhiṣekaiścakravartiputravadabhiṣicyate |
449:693: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-samāropāpavādalakṣaṇaṃ me bhagavān deśayatu yathāhaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvāḥ samāropāpavādakudṛṣṭivarjitamatayaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeran |
449:695: atha khalu bhagavān punarapi mahāmaterbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyādhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā imāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
449:699: atha khalu bhagavānetameva gāthārthamuddyotayan punarapyetadavocat-caturvidho mahāmate asatsamāropaḥ |
449:713: asaddhetusamāropaḥ punarmahāmate yaduta ahetusamutpannaṃ prāgvijñānaṃ paścādabhūtvā māyāvadanutpannaṃ pūrvaṃ cakṣūrūpālokasmṛtipūrvakaṃ pravartate |
449:724: parikalpitasvabhāvā iva paratantrāśayā viśvarūpacintāmaṇisadṛśāḥ sarvabuddhakṣetraparṣanmaṇḍalagatā māyāsvapnapratibhāsapratibimbodakacandragatisamānutpādabhaṅgaśāśvatocchedarahitān sarvadharmān saṃmukhaṃ sarvatathāgatebhyaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānavirahān dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvanti,
449:726: yāvadanekāni samādhikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi pratilabhyaḥ taiḥ samādhibhiḥ kṣetrātkṣetraṃ saṃkrāmanti |
449:727: buddhapūjābhiyuktāśca sarvopapattidevabhavanālayeṣu ratnatrayamupadeśya buddharūpamāsthāya śrāvakagaṇabodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtāḥ svacittadṛśyamātrāvatāraṇatayā bāhyabhāvābhāvopadeśaṃ kurvanti sadasatpakṣavinivṛttyartham ||
449:732: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma-deśayatu bhagavān śūnyatānutpādādvayaniḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmāṇām,
449:733: yena śūnyatānutpādādvayaniḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇāvabodhena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā nāstyastivikalpavarjitāḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeran ||
449:734: atha khalu bhagavān mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-tena hi mahāmate śṛṇu,
449:735: tatsādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru |
449:737: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt |
449:741: yaduta lakṣaṇaśūnyatā bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā apracaritaśūnyatā pracaritaśūnyatā sarvadharmanirabhilāpyaśūnyatā paramārthāryajñānamahāśūnyatā itaretaraśūnyatā ca saptamī ||
449:748: yaduta svayaṃ svabhāvābhāvotpattito mahāmate bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā bhavati sarvadharmāṇām |
449:754: yaduta skandhā ātmātmīyarahitā hetuyuktikriyākarmayogaiḥ pravartamānāḥ pravartante |
449:764: tadyathā mahāmate śṛgālamātuḥ prāsāde hastigavaiḍakādyā na santi |
449:767: na ca punarmahāmate prāsādaḥ prāsādabhāvato nāsti,
449:769: na ca te'nyatra hastigavaiḍakādyā bhāvā nāvatiṣṭhante |
449:777: na ca punarmahāmate te notpadyante anyatra samādhyavasthāyām |
449:785: na yatra mahāmate nirvāṇaṃ tatra saṃsāraḥ |
449:790: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmime gāthe abhāṣata -
449:792: saṃsāraṃ svapnamāyākhyaṃ na ca karma vinaśyati || 135 ||
449:795: atha khalu bhagavān punarapi mahāmatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-etaddhi mahāmate śūnyatānutpādādvayaniḥsvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ sarvasūtrāntagatam |
449:801: evameva mahāmate sarvasūtrāntadeśanā dharmā bālānāṃ svavikalpasaṃtoṣaṇam,
449:803: tasmāttarhi mahāmate arthānusāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ na deśanābhilāpābhiniviṣṭena ||
449:804: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-tathāgatagarbhaḥ punarbhagavatā sūtrāntapāṭhe'nuvarṇitaḥ |
449:805: sa ca kila tvayā prakṛtiprabhāsvaraviśuddhyādiviśuddha eva varṇyate dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharaḥ sarvasattvadehāntargataḥ |
449:806: mahārghamūlyaratnaṃ malinavastupariveṣṭitamiva skandhadhātvāyatanavastuveṣṭito rāgadveṣamohābhūtaparikalpamalamalino nityo dhruvaḥ śivaḥ śāśvataśca bhagavatā varṇitaḥ |
449:808: tīrthakarā api bhagavan nityaḥ kartā nirguṇo vibhuravyaya ityātmavādopadeśaṃ kurvanti ||
449:809: bhagavānāha-na hi mahāmate tīrthakarātmavādatulyo mama tathāgatagarbhopadeśaḥ |
449:810: kiṃ tu mahāmate tathāgatāḥ śūnyatābhūtakoṭinirvāṇānutpādānimittāpraṇihitādyānāṃ mahāmate padārthānāṃ tathāgatagarbhopadeśaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bālānāṃ nairātmyasaṃtrāsapadavivarjanārthaṃ nirvikalpanirābhāsagocaraṃ tathāgatagarbhamukhopadeśena deśayanti |
449:811: na cātra mahāmate anāgatapratyutpannaiḥ bodhisattvairmahāsattvairātmābhiniveśaḥ kartavyaḥ |
449:812: tadyathā mahāmate kumbhakāra ekasmānmṛtparamāṇurāśervividhāni bhāṇḍāni karoti hastaśilpadaṇḍodakasūtraprayatnayogāt,
449:813: evameva mahāmate tathāgatāstadeva dharmanairātmyaṃ sarvavikalpalakṣaṇavinivṛttaṃ vividhaiḥ prajñopāyakauśalyayogairgarbhopadeśena vā nairātmyopadeśena vā kumbhakāravaccitraiḥ padavyañjanaparyāyairdeśayante |
449:815: evaṃ hi mahāmate tathāgatagarbhopadeśamātmavādābhiniviṣṭānāṃ tīrthakarāṇāmākarṣaṇārthaṃ tathāgatagarbhopadeśena nirdiśanti-kathaṃ bata abhūtātmavikalpadṛṣṭipatitāśayā vimokṣatrayagocarapatitāśayopetāḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeranniti |
449:816: etadarthaṃ mahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstathāgatagarbhopadeśaṃ kurvanti |
449:818: tasmāttarhi mahāmate tīrthakaradṛṣṭivinivṛttyarthaṃ tathāgatanairātmyagarbhānusāriṇā ca te bhavitavyam ||
449:822: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo'nāgatāṃ janatāṃ samālokya punarapi bhagavantamadhyeṣate sma-deśayatu me bhagavān yogābhisamayaṃ yathā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāyogayogino bhavanti |
449:823: bhagavānāha-caturbhirmahāmate dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahāyogayogino bhavanti |
449:825: yaduta svacittadṛśyavibhāvanatayā ca utpādasthitibhaṅgadṛṣṭivivarjanatayā ca bāhyabhāvābhāvopalakṣaṇatayā ca svapratyātmāryajñānādhigamābhilakṣaṇatayā ca |
449:826: ebhirmahāmate caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāyogayogino bhavanti ||
449:827: tatra kathaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svacittadṛśyavibhāvanākuśalo bhavati ?
449:828: yaduta sa evaṃ pratyavekṣate-svacittamātramidaṃ traidhātukamātmātmīyarahitaṃ nirīhamāyūhaniyūhavigatamanādikālaprapañcadauṣṭhulyavāsanābhiniveśavāsitaṃ traidhātukavicitrarūpopacāropanibaddhaṃ dehabhogapratiṣṭhāgativikalpānugataṃ vikalpyate khyāyate ca |

449:1258: tīrthakaramohavargā hi mahāmate sadasatorbhāvānāmutpattimicchanti na svavikalpavicitrābhiniveśapratyayataḥ |
449:1261: bhāvopadeśaḥ punarmahāmate saṃsāraparigrahārthaṃ ca nāstītyucchedanivāraṇārthaṃ ca |
449:1263: māyābhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇanirdeśena mahāmate bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇavyāvṛttyarthaṃ bālapṛthagjanānāṃ kṛdṛṣṭilakṣaṇapatitāśayānāṃ svacittadṛśyamātrānavadhāriṇāṃ hetupratyayakriyotpattilakṣaṇābhiniviṣṭhānāṃ nivāraṇārthaṃ māyāsvapnasvabhāvalakṣaṇān sarvadharmān deśayāmi |
449:1264: ete bālapṛthagjanāḥ kudṛṣṭilakṣaṇāśayābhiniviṣṭā ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca sarvadharmā yathābhūtāvasthānadarśanādvisaṃvādayiṣyanti |
449:1265: tatra yathābhūtāvasthānadarśanaṃ mahāmate sarvadharmāṇāṃ yaduta svacittadṛśyamātrāvatāraḥ ||
449:1270: yairnāmapadavyañjanakāyaiḥ sūpalakṣitairbodhisattvā mahāsattvā arthapadavyañjanānusāriṇaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya tathaiva sarvasattvānavabodhayiṣyanti |
449:1271: tatra mahāmate kāyo nāma yaduta yadvastvāśritya nāma kriyate,
449:1281: nāma punarmahāmate yaduta akṣarāṇāṃ ca nāmasvabhāvabhedo'kārādyāvaddhakāraḥ |
449:1283: tatra padakāyāḥ punarmahāmate ye padavīthīgāmino hastyaśvanaramṛgapaśugomahiṣājaiḍakādyāḥ padakāyasaṃjñāṃ labhante |
449:1284: nāma ca vyañjanaṃ ca punarmahāmate catvāra arūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ |
449:1290: vyañjane padakāye ca nāmni cāpi viśeṣataḥ |
449:1291: bālāḥ sajjanti durmedhā mahāpaṅke yathā gajāḥ || 170 ||
449:1292: punaraparaṃ mahāmate yuktihetubuddhivaikalyātkutārkikā durvidagdhamatayo'nāgate'dhvani pṛṣṭā vidvadbhirekatvānyatvobhayānubhayadṛṣṭilakṣaṇavinirmuktamantadvayavidhiṃ pṛcchadbhirevaṃ vakṣyanti-apraśnamidaṃ nedaṃ yoniśa iti,
449:1294: evaṃ nirvāṇaṃ saṃskārebhyo lakṣaṇāllakṣaṇaṃ guṇebhyo guṇī bhūtebhyo bhautikaṃ dṛśyāddarśanaṃ pāṃśubhyo'ṇavo jñānādyoginaḥ,
449:1295: evamādyenottarottarakramalakṣaṇavidhinā avyākṛtāni pṛṣṭāḥ sthāpanīyaṃ bhagavatā avyākṛtamiti vakṣyanti |
449:1296: na tu te mohapuruṣā evaṃ jñāsyanti yathā śrotṝṇāṃ buddhivaikalyāt tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā utrāsapadavivarjanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ na vyākurvanti |
449:1297: avyākṛtānyapi ca mahāmate tīrthakaradṛṣṭivādavyudāsārthaṃ nopadiśyante tathāgataiḥ |
449:1298: tīrthakarā hi mahāmate evaṃvādinaḥ-yaduta sa jīvastaccharīram,
449:1301: tīrthakarāṇāṃ hi mahāmate kāraṇavisaṃmūḍhānāmavyākṛtaṃ na tu matpravacane |
449:1302: matpravacane tu mahāmate grāhyagrāhakavisaṃyukte vikalpo na pravartate |
449:1304: ye tu mahāmate grāhyagrāhakābhiniviṣṭāḥ svacittadṛśyamātrānavadhāritamatayasteṣāṃ sthāpyaṃ bhavati |
449:1305: caturvidhapadapraśnavyākaraṇena mahāmate tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayanti |
449:1306: sthāpanīyamiti mahāmate kālāntaradeśanaiṣā mayā kṛtā aparipakvendriyāṇām |
449:1313: tatra anāyūhāniryūhāḥ punarmahāmate sarvadharmāḥ kena kāraṇena ?
449:1320: tatra anityāḥ punarmahāmate sarvadharmāḥ kena kāraṇenocyante ?
449:1323: tatra nityāḥ punarmahāmate sarvadharmāḥ kena kāraṇena ?
449:1333: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-deśayatu me bhagavān srotaāpannānāṃ srotaāpattigatiprabhedanayalakṣaṇam |
449:1334: yena srotaāpattigatiprabhedanayalakṣaṇena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ srotaāpannānāṃ srotaāpattigatiprabhedanayalakṣaṇakuśalā uttarottarasakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhattvopāyalakṣaṇavidhijñāstathā sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayeyuḥ,
449:1335: yathā nairātmyalakṣaṇadvayamāvaraṇadvayaṃ ca prativiśodhya bhūmerbhūmilakṣaṇātikramagatiṃgatāstathāgatācintyagativiṣayagocaraṃ pratilabhya viśvarūpamaṇisadṛśāḥ sarvasattvopajīvyatāmadhigaccheyuḥ,
449:1340: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt |
449:1343: yaduta hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭāḥ tatra mahāmate hīnaḥ saptajanmabhavaparamaḥ |
449:1346: eṣāṃ tu mahāmate trayāṇāṃ trīṇi saṃyojanāni mṛdumadhyādhimātrāṇyeva bhavanti |
449:1349: etāni mahāmate trīṇi saṃyojanāni viśeṣottarottareṇa arhatāmarhatphalībhavanti |
449:1350: tatra mahāmate satkāyadṛṣṭirdvividhā yaduta sahajā ca parikalpitā ca,
449:1353: sa ca tatra na sannāsanna sadasan,
449:1355: atha ca bālairvikalpyate vicitrasvabhāvalakṣaṇābhiniveśena mṛgatṛṣṇikeva mṛgaiḥ |
449:1358: sahajā punarmahāmate srotaāpannasya satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ svaparakāyasamatayā catuḥskandharūpalakṣaṇatvādrūpasyotpattibhūtabhautikatvātparasparahetulakṣaṇatvādbhūtānāṃ rūpasyāsamudaya iti kṛtvā srotaāpannasya sadasatpakṣadṛṣṭidarśanātsatkāyadṛṣṭiḥ prahīṇā bhavati |
449:1359: ata eva satkāyadṛṣṭiprahīṇasya rāgo na pravartate |
449:1361: vicikitsālakṣaṇaṃ punarmahāmate yaduta prāptidharmādhigamasudṛṣṭilakṣaṇatvātpūrvaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭidvayavikalpaprahīṇatvācca vicikitsā dharmeṣu na bhavati |
449:1364: śīlaṃ punarmahāmate kathaṃ na parāmṛśati srotaāpannaḥ ?
449:1366: parāmṛṣṭiḥ punarmahāmate yaduta śīlavratataponiyamairbālapṛthagjanā bhogasukhābhilāṣiṇo bhavotpattiṃ prārthayante,
449:1371: na tu mahāmate srotaāpannasya trisaṃyojanaprahīṇasya rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante ||
449:1394: anye punarmahāmate bodhisattvacaryācaritāvino buddhanirmitanairmāṇikāśca upāyakuśalamūlapraṇidhānapūrvakatvātparṣanmaṇḍaleṣūpapattiṃ darśayanti buddhaparṣanmaṇḍalopaśobhanārtham |
449:1400: saṃjñāveditanirodhasamāpattiśca mahāmate svacittadṛśyagativyatikramastasya na yujyate cittamātratvāt ||
449:1406: dhyātā dhyānaṃ ca dhyeyaṃ ca prahāṇaṃ satyadarśanam |
449:1408: punaraparaṃ mahāmate dviprakārā buddhiḥ pravicayabuddhiśca vikalpalakṣaṇagrāhābhiniveśapratiṣṭhāpikā ca |
449:1409: tatra mahāmate pravicayabuddhirnāma yaduta yayā buddhyā bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ pravicīyamānaṃ catuṣkoṭikārahitaṃ nopalabhyate,
449:1411: tatra mahāmate catuṣkoṭikā yaduta ekatvānyatvobhayanobhayāstināstinityānityarahitāṃ catuṣkoṭikāmiti vadāmi |
449:1412: etayā catuṣkoṭikayā mahāmate rahitāḥ sarvadharmā ityucyate |
449:1415: yaduta yena mahāmate cittavikalpalakṣaṇagrāhābhiniveśena uṣṇadravacalakaṭhinānabhūtaparikalpalakṣaṇān mahābhūtān pratijñāhetulakṣaṇadṛṣṭāntābhiniveśādasadbhūtasamāropeṇa samāropayati,
449:1417: etanmahāmate buddhidvayasya lakṣaṇaṃ yena buddhidvayalakṣaṇena samanvāgatā bodhisattvā dharmapudgalanairātmyalakṣaṇagatiṃgatā nirābhāsabuddhipravicayacaryābhūmikuśalāḥ prathamāṃ bhūmiṃ pratilabhante,
449:1422: kṣetraśataṃ cāvabhāsya uttarottarabhūmilakṣaṇavidhijñāḥ praṇidhānavaiśeṣikatayā vikrīḍanto dharmameghābhiṣekābhiṣiktāstathāgatapratyātmabhūmimadhigamya daśaniṣṭhāpadasunibaddhadharmāṇaḥ sattvaparipākāya vicitrairnirmāṇakiraṇairvirājante pratyātmagatisukhasamāhitāḥ ||
449:1423: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahābhūtabhautikakuśalena bhavitavyam |
449:1424: kathaṃ ca mahāmate bodhisattvo mahābhūtabhautikakuśalo bhavati ?
449:1425: tatra mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva itaḥ pratisaṃśikṣate tatsatyaṃ yatra mahābhūtānāmasaṃbhavo'saṃbhūtāni cemāni mahāmate bhūtānīti prativipaśyati |
449:1426: evaṃ prativipaśyan nāma vikalpamātraṃ svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhādbāhyabhāvābhāvānnāma cittadṛśyavikalpamātramidaṃ yaduta traidhātukaṃ mahābhūtabhautikarahitaṃ prativipaśyati cātuṣkoṭikanayaviśuddhimātmātmīyarahitaṃ yathābhūtasvalakṣaṇāvasthānāvasthitamanutpādasvalakṣaṇasiddham |
449:1427: tatra mahāmate mahābhūteṣu kathaṃ bhautiakaṃ bhavati ?
449:1438: tasmādetanmahāmate mahābhūtabhautikalakṣaṇaṃ tīrthakarairvikalpyate na tu mayā ||
449:1442: tatra mahāmate catvāraḥ skandhā arūpiṇo vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāṃ vijñānaṃ ca |
449:1445: na ca mahāmate arūpiṇāṃ catuṣkasaṃkhyā bhavatyākāśavat |
449:1448: evameva mahāmate skandhāḥ saṃkhyālakṣaṇagaṇanātītā bhāvābhāvavivarjitāścātuṣkoṭikarahitāḥ saṃkhyāgaṇanānirdeśena nirdiśyante bālairna tvāryaiḥ ||
449:1454: sarvabuddhaparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu tīrthyadṛṣṭinivāraṇāya viviktadharmopadeśena mahāmate kriyamāṇena dharmanairātmyadarśanaṃ viśudhyate,
449:1460: evameva mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvopajīvyo bhavati ||
449:1464: etanmahāmate caturvidhaṃ tīrthakarāṇāṃ nirvāṇaṃ na tu matpravacane |
449:1469: tatkathaṃ manovijñānasyaiva vyāvṛttirbhavati na tu saptānāṃ vijñānānām ?
449:1471: manovijñānaṃ punarmahāmate viṣayaparicchedābhiniveśena pravartamānaṃ vāsanābhirālayavijñānaṃ prapuṣṇāti |
449:1474: udadhitaraṃgā iva mahāmate svacittadṛśyaviṣayapavaneritāḥ pravartante nivartante ca |
449:1475: atastena mahāmate manovijñānena vyāvṛttena saptānāṃ vijñānānāṃ vyāvṛttirbhavati ||
449:1477: nāhaṃ nirvāmi bhāvena kriyayā lakṣaṇena ca |
449:1480: hetuṃ dadāti cittasya vijñānaṃ ca samāśritam || 178 ||
449:1484: punaraparaṃ mahāmate parikalpitasvabhāvaprabhedanayalakṣaṇamupadekṣyāmo yena parikalpitasvabhāvaprabhedanayalakṣaṇena suprativibhāgaviddhena tvaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vikalpakalparahitāḥ pratyātmāryasvagatitīrthyanayagatisudṛṣṭabuddhayo grāhyagrāhakavikalpaprahīṇāḥ paratantravividhavicitralakṣaṇaṃ parikalpitasvabhāvākāraṃ na prativikalpayiṣyanti |
449:1486: yaduta abhilāpavikalpo'vidheyavikalpo lakṣaṇavikalpo'rthavikalpaḥ svabhāvavikalpo hetuvikalpo dṛṣṭivikalpo yuktivikalpa utpādavikalpo'nutpādavikalpaḥ saṃbandhavikalpo bandhābandhavikalpaḥ |
449:1492: yaduta asti tatkiṃcidabhidheyavastu svabhāvakamāryajñānagatigamyaṃ yadāśrityābhilāpaḥ pravartate iti vikalpayati |
449:1494: yaduta tasminnevābhidheye mṛgatṛṣṇākhye lakṣaṇavaicitryābhiniveśenābhiniveśate yaduta uṣṇadravacalakaṭhinalakṣaṇātsarvabhāvān vikalpayati |
449:1500: yaduta yadyena hetupratyayena sadasatorvibhajyate hetulakṣaṇotpattitaḥ sa hetuvikalpaḥ |
449:1513: yathā puruṣaḥ pāśasaṃyogādrajjugranthiḥ kriyate mucyate ca |
449:1525: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate tvayā anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvairmāyā nāstyastitvena nābhiniveṣṭavyā ||
449:1528: nirābhāse viśeṣe ca prajñā vai saṃpravartate || 180 ||
449:1530: kalpitaṃ gṛhyate bhrāntyā paratantraṃ na kalpyate || 181 ||
449:1532: nimittaṃ hi tathā citraṃ kalpyamānaṃ na sidhyati || 182 ||
449:1539: yathā hi yogināṃ vastu citramekaṃ virājate |
449:1540: na hyasti citratā tatra tathā kalpitalakṣaṇam || 186 ||
449:1542: timiraṃ na rūpaṃ nārūpaṃ paratantraṃ tathābudhaiḥ || 187 ||
449:1543: haimaṃ syāttu yathā śuddhaṃ jalaṃ kaluṣavarjitam |
449:1545: nāsti vai kalpito bhāvaḥ paratantraśca vidyate |
449:1555: pañca dharmā bhavettattvaṃ svabhāvā hi trayastathā |
449:1559: buddhyā vivecyamānaṃ tu na tantraṃ nāpi kalpitam |
449:1560: niṣpanno nāsti vai bhāvaḥ kathaṃ buddhyā vikalpyate || 196 ||
449:1562: bhāvābhāvavinirmukto dvau svabhāvau kathaṃ nu tau || 197 ||
449:1569: punarapi mahāmatirāha-deśayatu me bhagavān pratyātmāryajñānagatilakṣaṇamekayānaṃ ca,
449:1570: yena bhagavan pratyātmaikayānagatilakṣaṇena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pratyātmāryajñānaikayānakuśalā aparapraṇeyā bhaviṣyanti buddhadharmeṣu ||
449:1574: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt |
449:1575: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat-pramāṇāptopadeśavikalpābhāvānmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattva ekākī rahogataḥ svapratyātmabuddhyā vicārayatyaparapraṇeyo dṛṣṭivikalpavivarjita uttarottaratathāgatabhūmipraveśanatayā vyāyamate |
449:1589: yadā teṣāṃ mahāmate sarvadoṣavāsanāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti dharmanairātmyāvabodhāt,
449:1591: punarapi lokottarānāsravadhātuparyāpannān saṃbhārān paripūrya acintyadharmakāyavaśavartitāṃ pratilapsyante ||
449:1595: yānānāṃ nāsti vai niṣṭhā yāvaccittaṃ pravartate |
449:1596: citte tu vai parāvṛtte na yānaṃ na ca yāninaḥ || 202 ||
449:1602: tathā hi śrāvako mūḍho lakṣaṇena pravāhyate || 205 ||
449:1605: niṣṭhāgatirna tasyāsti na ca bhūyo nivartate |
449:1608: tathā te buddhadharmākhyaṃ kāyaṃ prāpsyanti māmakam || 208 ||
449:1609: iti laṅkāvatāre ṣaṭtriṃśatsāhasrasarvadharmasamuccayo nāma dvitīyaḥ parivartaḥ ||
